void Ofono::callsChanged (  )  [signal]

Emited whenever oFono DBus sends "Calls". The list of current calls changed. Used internally to emit either incomingCall() or outgoingCall()

VoiceCallState Ofono::translateState ( QString  state  )  [static]

Just map the oFono call states to the c++ state enum If there is no matching state, it returns the enum state NONE (0)
